title: Bin Day
previewDesc: Bin Day is a surreal comedy about despondent graphic designer, Sara. After being called into a meeting with her volatile boss and sycophant supervisor, she is told that the business has a new optimisation app. It's suggestion for Sara's future at the company? Promote her to the role of The Office Bin. What a load of old rubbish.

title: Brasslit
previewDesc: A sleep-deprived Kurt becomes hellbent on locating the mysterious trumpet noise that's keeping him up at night. But will what he discovers be more than meets the ear?

title: Stag
previewDesc: When a surely bachelor arrives at his stag do in Alicante, he discovers that no one has turned up apart from one estranged university mate. But will his ego get in the way of salvaging the weekend and also their friendship?
